scripts.remove_dist: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); try{ fs.rmdirSync('./dist/', { recursive: true }) } catch{}; process.exit(0);"
scripts.remove_public_js: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); try{ fs.rmdirSync('./public/asset/js/', { recursive: true }) } catch{}; process.exit(0);"
scripts.remove_public_style: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); try{ fs.rmdirSync('./public/asset/style/', { recursive: true }) } catch{}; process.exit(0);"
scripts.build_app: npm run remove_public_js && npm run remove_public_style && npm run sass && tsc --noEmit --project tsconfig.json && webpack --config webpack.build.js
scripts.build: npm audit && npm run build_tsc && npm run check && npm run build_app
